Nodes.name: node0
Nodes.label: CPU begins executing at F000:FFF0

Nodes.name: node1
Nodes.label: BIOS initialization (includes setting up the IVT)

Nodes.name: nodef0
Nodes.label: If floppy disk present

Nodes.name: nodef1
Nodes.label: BIOS attempts to retrieve first sector (Track 0, Head 0, Sector 1) from disk in floppy disk drive A:

Nodes.name: nodef2
Nodes.label: If no disk found in floppy disk drive A:

Nodes.name: nodef3
Nodes.label: If disk found in floppy disk drive A:, read boot sector from (T 0, H 0, S 1) into memory at 0x0000:0x7C00

Nodes.name: nodef4
Nodes.label: If BIOS check for last two bytes of boot sector != 0x55AA

Nodes.name: nodef5
Nodes.label: If BIOS check for last two bytes of boot sector == 0x55AA

Nodes.name: nodehd0
Nodes.label: If hard disk present

Nodes.name: nodehd1
Nodes.label: BIOS attempts to retrieve first sector (Track 0, Head 0, Sector 1) from disk in harddisk drive C:

Nodes.name: nodehd2
Nodes.label: If valid MBR

Nodes.name: nodehd3
Nodes.label: If corrupt/invalid MBR

Nodes.name: nodehd4
Nodes.label: Active partition found in MBR partition table

Nodes.name: nodehd5
Nodes.label: No active partition found in MBR partition table

Nodes.name: nodehd6
Nodes.label: Move/save MBR to fixed location in memory

Nodes.name: nodehd7
Nodes.label: BIOS attempts to read OS boot sector from first sector of active partition (using values of the start and end sectors from the MBR partition table entry) into memory at 0x0000:0x7C00

Nodes.name: nodehd8
Nodes.label: If unsuccessful read of OS boot sector into 0x0000:0x7C00

Nodes.name: nodehd9
Nodes.label: If successful read of OS boot sector into 0x0000:0x7C00

Nodes.name: nodeboot
Nodes.label: BIOS assumes valid boot sector found; BIOS transfers control to boot sector loaded in memory at  0x0000:0x7C00

Nodes.name: nodee0
Nodes.label: BIOS Boot sector error handling
